translation.heading: Hi, I’m Charles, Front-end Developer
translation.desc: I design and develop experiences that make people’s lives simpler through Web and Mobile apps.I work with FIgma , HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, ReactNative and Flutter.

translation.heading: Hi, Men Charles, Front-end dasturchiman
translation.desc: Men veb va mobil ilovalar orqali odamlarning hayotini soddalashtiradigan tajribalarni ishlab chiqaman va tadbiq qilaman. Men FIgma, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, ReactNative va Flutter bilan ishlayman.

translation.heading: Привет, я Чарльз, фронтенд-разработчик
translation.desc: Я проектирую и разрабатываю решения, которые упрощают жизнь людей с помощью веб- и мобильных приложений. Я работаю с FIgma, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, ReactNative и Flutter.
